weeklyPenalty.remark: Prove it to yourself, do it for yourself! Since you did not stay in budget today you get:
weeklyPenalty.title: goat
weeklyPenalty.action: A goat broke into the garden

weeklyPenalty.remark: Notice the small things. The rewards are inversely proportional. Since you did not stay in budget today you get:
weeklyPenalty.title: deer
weeklyPenalty.action: A deer got into your garden

weeklyPenalty.remark: There are no rewards or punishments - only consequences.  Since you did not stay in budget today you get:
weeklyPenalty.title: cow
weeklyPenalty.action: A cow got into your garden

weeklyPenalty.remark: We all learned how to walk and talk by interacting with our environment, with real goals and rewards. Now let's learn how to budget...Since you did not stay in budget today you get:
weeklyPenalty.title: pig
weeklyPenalty.action: A pig got into your garden

weeklyPenalty.remark: If you're looking for immediate rewards, you're only looking for the money. Since you did not stay in budget today you get:
weeklyPenalty.title: bleach
weeklyPenalty.action: Bleach got poured on your garden, loose two items

weeklyPenalty.remark: If you're looking for immediate rewards, you're only looking for the money.  Since you did not stay in budget today you get:
weeklyPenalty.title: fire
weeklyPenalty.action: A fire has burnt your garden, loose two items
